statements: UPDATE reports_on_energy_consumption SET energy_consumed = 1200.50, cost_savings = 250.75 WHERE report_id = 'e4a1605c-7bbe-4206-8d6a-267e9b90ba6d';
UPDATE reports_on_energy_consumption SET cost_savings = 175.25, energy_consumed = 1000.75 WHERE location_id = 'f9637653-2a5d-45aa-8b34-0da35e380f64';
UPDATE reports_on_energy_consumption SET cost_savings = 100.50, energy_consumed = 250.75 WHERE report_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE reports_on_energy_consumption SET location_id = '98765432-1234-5678-9123-456789012345', report_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE report_id = 'abcdef12-abcd-1234-5678-abcdef123456';
UPDATE energy_consumption SET energy_consumed = 1500, cost_saved = 200 WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE smart_lighting SET power_consumption = 25.5, dimmable = true WHERE location_id = '98765432-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
UPDATE energy_consumption SET energy_consumed = 250.75, cost_saved = 30.50 WHERE device_id = 'd47a9741-c35f-4e2b-a69a-16b09c9334b2';
UPDATE smart_lighting SET power_consumption = 12.5, dimmable = TRUE, energy_saving_percent = 20.5 WHERE location_id = '30ecfd24-f667-4ee7-8d42-7c516aeb95a8';
UPDATE energy_consumption SET energy_consumed = 150.75, date = '2022-08-15' WHERE report_id = 101;
UPDATE smart_lights SET status = 'ON', cost_saved = 25.50 WHERE light_id = 201;
UPDATE energy_consumption SET energy_consumed = 1500.75, date = '2022-08-15' WHERE report_id = 101;
UPDATE smart_lights SET cost_saved = 500.50, location = 'Office A', status = 'ON' WHERE light_id = 201;
UPDATE energy_consumption_report SET consumption_kWh = 150.5, date_published = '2022-10-15' WHERE report_id = 101;
UPDATE smart_lights SET power_consumption = 20.8, is_smart = TRUE WHERE light_id = 201;
UPDATE energy_consumption_report SET consumption_kWh = 150.75 WHERE report_id = 101;
UPDATE smart_lights SET is_smart = true, location = 'Living Room' WHERE light_id = 201;
UPDATE energy_consumption SET energy_consumed = 150.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE smart_lighting SET status = 'OFF', wattage = 75.5 WHERE room_id = 3;
UPDATE energy_consumption SET cost = cost + 50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE smart_lighting SET wattage = CASE WHEN status = 'ON' THEN wattage + 10 ELSE wattage - 5 END WHERE room_id = 3;
